company.title: Company Info
company.message: "I think we are at the dawn of a new era in commercial space exploration" - Elon Musk
company.ceo_description: Elon Reeve Musk is a businessman and investor. He is the founder, chairman, CEO, and CTO of SpaceX; angel investor, CEO, product architect, and former chairman of Tesla, Inc.; owner, executive chairman, and CTO of X Corp.
